title: Effects of Transforming Inches to Centimeters
question_text:
Incoming freshmen at a large high school routinely have their heights measured by the school nurse. The nurse records each height in inches and then determines the standardized $z$-score for each student.
How would the $z$-scores be affected if each height was converted from inches to centimeters? NOTE: $1 \text{ inch} = 2.54\text{ cm}$â€‹
